skills.skill: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere, After Effects)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and create visual communication assets, including animation, video, photography, and other media solutions.
Provide advanced level writing and editing for content creation, benefiting internal communication in the IT department.
Support the development of the communication strategy for IT department.
Oversee the conception and execution of communication projects, ensuring they align with the company's design standards.
Manage intranet pages by refreshing content and design periodically.
Collaborate with customers and stakeholders to ensure correct messaging and achieve communication objectives.
Plan clear progressions of ideation by implementing structure into the creative process, including scripts, storyboards, presentation materials, timelines, and concept sketches.
Manage deadlines and workflows to deliver content that meets customer demand.
Interact with users to gather feedback and enhance the user experience.
Drive the development and communication of design guidelines and patterns.
Deliver work effort as part of Agile projects.

education_certification.credential: B.A., B.F.A., or B.S. in Art, Design, Graphic Design or a related field.
